nodes.text: Ferrus was a Human male who sold armor and weapon modifications in Farnel Outpost on the planet Balmorra during the Galactic War.

Ferrus appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Republic players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Ferrus was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors.
